name: Captain Starforce
description:
Any ship stranded in The Belt will be smashed to pieces. It is inevitable.

The Starforce operate in the most dangerous asteroid belts in the galaxy.

When a ship is stranded, when no one else can help. Starforce answer the call.

Only the bravest and most skilled pilots are up to the challenge.

So, Captain. Are you ready?

Take control of a starship and rescue stranded astronauts in this fast-paced arcade game.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50, 03/04/2022 to 04/04/2022
